Year: ####Results for England from 2009 onwards only represent 'commercial' holdings with significant levels of farming activity. These significant levels are classified as any holding with more than 5 hectares of agricultural land; 1 hectare of orchard; 0.5 hectares of vegetables or 0.1 hectares of protected crop; or more than 10 cow; 50 pigs; 20 sheep; 20 goats or 1000 poultry####
